description:
The Keroro Platoon thinks it will be hilarious to pull a prank on Giroro: they stick Sumomo in a Natsumi suit, and have the fake Natsumi hit on Giroro outrageously.  But... Giroro might not be the wisest person to play pranks on.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro Ai no Kidou Hohei de Arimasu / Giroro tai Natsumi Meguriai... mo de Arimasu
Giroro tombe dans le panneau / Giroro contre April : rencontre au sommet
One Potato, Two Potato, Sweet Potato, Amore!
ギロロ 愛の機動歩兵 であります / ギロロVS[たい]夏美 めぐりあい... も であります
